YagoMod:DivineForm.NAME: Divine Form
YagoMod:DivineForm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Intangible. NL Lose 4 Max HP.

YagoMod:SoulBeam.NAME: Soul Beam
YagoMod:SoulBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Lose !M! Max HP.

YagoMod:Inferno.NAME: Inferno
YagoMod:Inferno.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If this card is discarded, deal !D! damage to all enemies. Increase the damage of ALL Inferno cards by !M! this combat.

YagoMod:DesperatePrayer.NAME: Desperate Prayer
YagoMod:DesperatePrayer.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. NL Heal for its cost.

YagoMod:EmbraceThorns.NAME: Embrace Thorns
YagoMod:EmbraceThorns.DESCRIPTION: Lose 2 HP. NL Whenever you are attacked, deal !M! damage back.
YagoMod:EmbraceThorns.FLAVOR: It's a real thorn on my side.

YagoMod:ToxicChemicals.NAME: Toxic Chemicals
YagoMod:ToxicChemicals.DESCRIPTION: Discard 1 card. NL Obtain a common potion.

YagoMod:VampiricInstinct.NAME: Vampiric Instinct
YagoMod:VampiricInstinct.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle !M! Bite into your discard pile. Exhaust.

YagoMod:SurrenderFlesh.NAME: Surrender Flesh
YagoMod:SurrenderFlesh.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Lose 2 max HP.

YagoMod:Oblation.NAME: Oblation
YagoMod:Oblation.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If this card is discarded from your hand, heal !M! and draw 1 card.

YagoMod:Dusk.NAME: Dusk
YagoMod:Dusk.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] equal to your hand size.

YagoMod:Penance.NAME: Penance
YagoMod:Penance.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you heal, NL Draw a card.

YagoMod:FlagellantParade.NAME: Flagellant Parade
YagoMod:FlagellantParade.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose HP from a card, deal !D! damage to a random enemy.

YagoMod:BloodAlchemy.NAME: Blood Alchemy
YagoMod:BloodAlchemy.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, take !M! damage and gain a random potion.

YagoMod:SacrificialStab.NAME: Sacrificial Stab
YagoMod:SacrificialStab.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, Gain !M! [E].

YagoMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
YagoMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

YagoMod:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
YagoMod:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
YagoMod:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

YagoMod:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
YagoMod:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

YagoMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
YagoMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and poison to an enemy.
